dialogue.text: But I also feel overwhelmed when I think of how many possibilities I would need to deal with if I tried to explore further â€” vertically and horizontally.

psychological_notes: Evan experiences the paralysis that comes with recognizing infinite possibility. Each level of meta-thinking multiplies options exponentially. He's mapped his limits precisely because venturing beyond them leads to overwhelming complexity. This shows healthy respect for cognitive load and the anxiety of boundless exploration.
philosophical_underpinning: Finite beings confronting infinite possibility spaces
therapeutic_direction: Client recognizes the burden of unlimited metacognitive exploration
